title: Formula E announces TDK as Title Partner of the 2026 Tokyo E-Prix night race and Official Partner of the 2025/26 season
desc: Formula E and TDK today announced a major strategic partnership designating the company as the Title Partner of the 2026 TDK Tokyo E-Prix, set to take place as a night race event in the heart of Japan’s capital, and home of TDK, on 25 and 26 July 2026.
